00352   inline void print(QPainter& printPainter,QPaintDeviceMetrics& metrics,QString filePath,bool whiteBackground){
00353 
00354    QRect textRec = QRect(printPainter.viewport().left() + 5 ,printPainter.viewport().height() - 20,printPainter.viewport().width() - 5,20);
00355    QFont f("Helvetica",8);
00356    printPainter.setFont(f);
00357    printPainter.setPen(black); 
00358    printPainter.drawText(textRec,Qt::AlignAuto | Qt::AlignVCenter,
00359     QString("File: %1     Start time: %2 min %3 s %4 ms, Duration: %5 ms").arg(filePath).arg(startMinute->value()).arg(startSecond->value()).arg(startMilisecond->value()).arg(duration->displayText()));
00360 
00361    //Modify the viewport so the view will not draw on the legend
00362    QRect newViewport = QRect(printPainter.viewport().left(),printPainter.viewport().top(),printPainter.viewport().width(),printPainter.viewport().height());
00363    newViewport.setBottom(printPainter.viewport().bottom() - 20);   
00364    printPainter.setViewport(newViewport);
00365    view.print(printPainter,metrics,whiteBackground);
00366    printPainter.resetXForm();
00367   };

00406   inline void updateEvents(bool active,QString providerName,double time,double newTime){
00407    long eventTime = static_cast<long>(floor(0.5 + time));
00408    long newEventTime = static_cast<long>(floor(0.5 + newTime));   
00409    if((eventTime >= startTime  && eventTime <= (startTime + timeWindow)) ||
00410       (newEventTime >= startTime  && newEventTime <= (startTime + timeWindow))) view.updateEvents(providerName,active);
00411   };
00412 
00415   inline void removeEvent(){view.removeEvent();};
00416 
00422   inline void updateEvents(bool active,QString providerName,double time){
00423    long eventTime = static_cast<long>(floor(0.5 + time));
00424    if((eventTime >= startTime  && eventTime <= (startTime + timeWindow))) view.updateEvents(providerName,active);
00425   };
